title: ACA Open Enrollment Starts This Week
teaser: Open enrollment for health care plans under the Affordable Care Act starts on Saturday. Already, you can shop for plans on HealthCare.gov.
contentencoded:
Open enrollment for health care plans under the Affordable Care Act starts on Saturday. Already, you can go to HealthCare.gov and start shopping around for plans — this time without logging in. That’s just one of the new features of the site, which has been rebuilt following its disastrous debut last fall.

Here & Now’s Robin Young talks to Sarah Kliff, a senior editor at Vox who oversees health coverage, about changes to HealthCare.gov, and what to expect from the second annual open enrollment period.

Guest

  • Sarah Kliff, a senior editor at Vox. She tweets @sarahkliff.
